description:
# Digital Marketing Manager job description (Remote, UK Only) 

**Main Purpose of Job**

In recent years Atlas has pivoted its focus to primarily serve the financial services industry. Since then, we have onboarded a range of big-name brands, including Prudential, M&G and Barclay...
